solution_line_template: Carl sells his watermelons for ${price_per_watermelon} each so today he sold ${profit} / ${price_per_watermelon} per watermelon = <<{profit}/{price_per_watermelon}={watermelons_sold}>>{watermelons_sold} watermelons.

He had {watermelons_left} watermelons left over, so this morning he started with {watermelons_left} + {watermelons_sold} = <<{watermelons_left}+{watermelons_sold}={initial_watermelons}>>{initial_watermelons} watermelons.
